front.title: Terminology in IPv6 over the TSCH mode of IEEE 802.15.4e

abstract.t: 6TiSCH proposes an architecture for an IPv6 multilink subnet that is composed of a high speed powered backbone and a number of IEEE802.15.4e TSCH wireless networks attached and synchronized by backbone routers. This document extends existing terminology documents available for Low-power and Lossy Networks to provide additional terminology elements.
